name: Quiet Soul
description: The Quiet Soul resembles an ordinary humanoid corpse when motionless, but its presence exudes a feeling of lethargy and despair.
memorable: Its ability to incapacitate foes with a melancholic aura makes it a dangerous opponent in combat.
goals: To control the battlefield and incapacitate enemies using its abilities.
relations: May serve other undead beings or be encountered alongside necromancers.
environment: Typically found in graveyards, abandoned places, or anywhere death has lingered.
strengths: Immune to cold, poison, and psychic damage, and possesses a potent crowd control ability.
weaknesses: Low physical attributes, particularly in Strength, making it ineffective in physical combat.
attacks: Ranged psychic lash attack dealing significant psychic damage, with the ability to further incapacitate unconscious foes.
most_powerful_ability: Melancholic emanation can put multiple creatures to sleep, severely disrupting enemy tactics.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Possesses a high Perception skill at +7, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Indistinguishable from a humanoid corpse while motionless.
Strong resilience against mind-affecting effects due to high Wisdom saving throw.
Can dominate the battlefield by incapacitating foes.
test_queries: melancholic creature that controls the battlefield
creature with psychic attacks and crowd control
monster resembling a corpse with mind powers
psychic monster immune to cold and poison
